Ashoka University
Description: Lehigh University and Ashoka University have a formal partnership that began in 2020. The partnership involves collaboration in areas such as academic exchange, research, and innovation. Through this partnership, faculty and students from both universities have the opportunity to participate in joint academic programs and research projects. The partnership also aims to promote cultural exchange and understanding between the United States and India. Additionally, Lehigh University and Ashoka University have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) to establish a joint initiative called the "Institute for Sustainable Infrastructure and Development" (ISID), which will focus on developing sustainable infrastructure solutions for India and other countries.
